tasks.build: cp LICENSE js/LICENSE && deno run --unstable -A https://deno.land/x/wasmbuild@0.15.4/main.ts  --project deno_doc_wasm --out js
tasks.gen_html: deno task tailwind && deno task tailwind_page && cargo run --example ddoc --features=html -- --name "Deno" --html ./examples/ddoc/deno.d.ts --output generated_docs/
